Rules.InvariantScript: LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'

If(ThisItem.IsSelected, ColorValue(LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Button Fill").'Default Value' )//_VarGblAppColors.PrimaryRed
 ,ColorValue(LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Primary Color").'Default Value' ))
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'

Sort(
    Filter(
        'Contacts.S',
        Party.'Customer Code' = 'Customer 360'.CustomerRecord.zx_customercode
    ),
    'Created On',
    SortOrder.Descending
)

If(ThisItem.Value.Title="Credit Limit",ColorValue(LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Primary Color").'Default Value'),
    ColorValue(LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Secondary Color").'Default Value'))
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'

Sort(
    Filter(
        OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
        'Order From'.'Customer Code' = 'Customer 360'.CustomerRecord.zx_customercode //&& IsToday('Created On')
    ),
    'Created On',
    SortOrder.Descending
)
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'

Sort(
    Filter(
        offlineLeadCollection,
        Party.'Customer Code' = 'Customer 360'.CustomerRecord.zx_customercode
    ),
    'Created On',
    SortOrder.Descending
)

If(ThisItem.Title="First Name",
ColorValue(LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Primary Color").'Default Value'),ColorValue(LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Secondary Color").'Default Value'))

If(ThisItem.Value.Title="Bank Name",
ColorValue(LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Primary Color").'Default Value'),ColorValue(LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Secondary Color").'Default Value') )

If(
    LookUp(
        OfflineVisitCollection,
        zx_visitid = ThisItem.zx_visitid
    ).zx_visitstatus = 'Visit Status'.Completed,
    DisplayMode.Disabled,
    DisplayMode.Edit
)

Text(
    LookUp(
        Sort(
           OfflineVisitCollection,
            zx_visitdate,
            SortOrder.Descending
        ),
        zx_Party.Parties = ThisItem.zx_Party.Parties && 'Visit Status' = ThisItem.'Visit Status'
    ).zx_visitdate,
    "dd/mm/yyyy"
)

"₹" & LookUp(
    Sort(
        OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
        createdon,
        SortOrder.Descending
    ),
    zx_OrderFrom.Parties = ThisItem.zx_Party.Parties
).zx_totalbillamount

If(
    LookUp(
        OfflineVisitCollection,
        zx_visitid = ThisItem.zx_visitid
    ).'Visit Status'= 'Visit Status'.Completed,
    false,
    true
)

If(
    LookUp(
        OfflineVisitCollection,
        zx_visitid = ThisItem.zx_visitid
    ).zx_visitstatus = 'Visit Status'.Completed,
    DisplayMode.View,
    DisplayMode.Edit
)
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Text Sub Title Font Size").'Default Value'

LookUp(OfflineProductSKUCollection,'Product SKU'=ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU').Product.'Product Name'//&" ("&LookUp(OfflineProductVariantCollection,'Product Variants'=LookUp(OfflineProductSKUCollection,'Product SKU'=ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU').'Product Variant'.'Product Variants').Variant.'Variant Name'&")"
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
